name: Mastercard Stuffed Hug Box
description:
A cute handknit hug box from the mastercard commercial.

Now you can have a hug whenever you want one!

I used my own pattern for these and sewed all the embellishments like, hands, eyes, mouth and hearts onto it.
The yarn is 100 percent acrylic and the box is stuffed with fiberfill.


***PLEASE ALLOW 2-3 DAYS TO MAKE!

Thanks for looking! :D

Happy Holidays!


Here is the commercial:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K3mgkiDbLdg&feature=related

***Multiple shipping options are available.
Just ask, before purchasing.

name: Radio Scarf
description: Handknit stereo embellished scarf in purple. :D
